title: The Typographer's Dream
content:
Running until nearly the end of February is a play about a typographer, geographer and stenographer who sit around obsessing over their professions. I have only read about the play, so I can't confirm if it is actually any good. Go check it out!   
   
 [The Typographer's Dream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170824/http:/www.encoretheatrecompany.org/)
author: Zara Evens
